document.full_text: even without an owner and with the nhl running the team, the phoenix coyotes were hopeful of re-signing free agent goalie ilya bryzgalov.
document.title: coyotes send ilya bryzgalov rights to flyers
lines_and_colors: even without an owner and with the nhl running the team, the phoenix coyotes were hopeful of re-signing free agent goalie ilya bryzgalov.
